name: VEX via
description: VEX via allows you to follow the progress and results of VEX Robotics Competition, VEX U, and VEX IQ Challenge events. Team lists, match schedules, match results, rankings, and skills challenge results are easy to access and can be sorted by event or by team. Result updates can be downloaded as the events unfold, and you can also register to receive instant score alerts for your favorite teams.
